description.value: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Ranged Spell Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 3 + 4]] (1d8 + 3 + the spell's level) psychic damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d10 + 3 + 4]] (1d10 + 3 + the spell's level) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

Melee Spell Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 3 + 4]] (1d8 + 3 + the spell's level) psychic damage.
The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take [[/r 2d6]] psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't @condition[incapacitated].
The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+14]] (+14) to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 ([[/r 2d10 + 8]]) piercing damage plus 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) fire damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+14]] (+14) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 ([[/r 2d6 + 8]]) slashing damage.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+14]] (+14) to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 ([[/r 2d8 + 8]]) bludgeoning damage.

Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become @condition[frightened] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

The dracolich exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ([[/r 18d6]]) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
The dracolich makes a Wisdom (@skill[Perception]) check.
The dracolich makes a tail attack.

The dracolich beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ([[/r 2d6 + 8]]) bludgeoning damage and be knocked @condition[prone]. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The dracolich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dracolich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
  • @UUID[Actor.null.Item.WZXTcSYDZvaB0nEy]{Detect}
  • @UUID[Actor.null.Item.B916DuPcRFkCoo8O]{Tail Attack}
  • @UUID[Actor.null.Item.cfSF0mvz3ryZrN1m]{Wing Attack}

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 2 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d8 + 2 + PB) slashing damage.

If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/r 1d6]] slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked @condition[prone].
You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d6 + 2 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d6 + 2 + PB) piercing damage or [[/r 1d6 + 2 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d6 + 2 + PB) bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is @condition[grappled] (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.
The beast can breathe both air and water.
You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d4 + 3 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d4 + 3 + PB) slashing damage
The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.
The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 4 + 2]] (1d8 + 4 + the spell's level) piercing damage.
The beast can breathe only underwater.
The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't @condition[incapacitated].
The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 2d6 + 2 + 5]] (2d6 + 2 + the spell's level) radiant damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d10 + 3 + 5]] (1d10 + 3 + the spell's level) radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains [[/r 1d10]] temporary hit points.
The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to [[/r 2d8 + 5]] (2d8 + the spell's level).
The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 4 + 4]] (1d8 + 4 + the spell's level) bludgeoning damage.
A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/r 1d10]] fire damage.

When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. Hit: [[/r 1d10 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d10 + PB) force damage.
The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't @condition[incapacitated].
The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d10 + 4 + 4]] (1d10 + 4 + the spell's level) bludgeoning damage (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Onl.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)

description.value: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d6 + 3 + 3]] (1d6 + 3 + the spell's level) piercing damage [[/r + 1d6]] force damage.

The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

  • Fuming. The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

  • Mirthful. The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is @condition[charmed] by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

  • Tricksy. The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts until the end of its next turn.
The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d12 + 3 + 6]] (1d12 + 3 + the spell's level) necrotic damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 3 + 6]] (1d8 + 3 + the spell's level) slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Ranged Spell Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 2d6 + 3 + 6]] (2d6 + 3 + the spell's level) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.
The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes [[/r 2d10 + 6]] (2d10 + the spell's level) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+3]] (+3) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 2 ([[/r 1d4]]) acid damage.

The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.
The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+17]] (+17) to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 36 ([[/r 4d12 + 10]]) force damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+17]] (+17) to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 36 ([[/r 4d12 + 10]]) force damage. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 ([[/r 4d12]]) bludgeoning damage and is knocked @condition[prone]. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked @condition[prone].
The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.
The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.
The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.
The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20+4]] (+4) to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 ([[/r 2d6 + 2]]) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new reflection rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.
The reflection can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
While in dim light or darkness, the reflection can take the Hide action as a bonus action. Its stealth bonus is also improved to +6.
While in sunlight, the reflection has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d12 + 3 + 3]] (1d12 + 3 + the spell's level) cold damage.

The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be @condition[frightened] for 1 minute. The @condition[frightened] creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against @condition[frightened] creatures.
Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.
While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.
The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/r 1d8 + 3 + 3]] (1d8 + 3 + the spell's level) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be @condition[frightened] of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

Ranged Spell Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 2d4 + 3 + 3]] (2d4 + 3 + the spell's level) necrotic damage.

Melee Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/r 1d6 + 3 + 3]] (1d6 + 3 + the spell's level) slashing damage. If the target is @condition[poisoned], it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be @condition[paralyzed] until the end of its next turn.

The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes [[/r 1d10]] force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be @condition[poisoned] until the start of its next turn.

Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/r 1d20 + @srd5e.userchar.spellAttackRanged]] (your spell attack modifier) to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. Hit: [[/r 1d6 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d6 + PB) fire damage.

The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take [[/r 1d6 + @srd5e.userchar.pb]] (1d6 + PB) fire damage.
